data.name: FreestyleFootball R
data.detailed_description:
《Freestyle Football》 is an online soccer game developed by JOYCITY, a well-known Korean online sports game company. The game adopts a fashionable and flamboyant visual style, incorporating elements of street art and soccer art. In 《Freestyle Football》 you can show your individuality and charm, and also enjoy the fun of teamwork.


In《Freestyle Football》your mini team will consist of 5 characters including a goalkeeper. Each player will control one character to participate in the game.

There are 3 game modes in Freestyle Football:
1.4V4 mode with fast-pace.
2.Friendly game where you can play freely with your friends.
3.Breakout mode where you can enjoy the game alone.

data.short_description: 《FreestyleFootball》 is a street hip-hop animation style soccer ACG game created by JCE and published by HOGA. In the game, you will collect and play as different characters in PVP team Competition. The game mode includes 4v4 team competition and club league.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: P4 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: P4 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
